name: Mr. Marshmallow Man and the Spooky Ghost Monsters
name_original: Mr. Marshmallow Man and the Spooky Ghost Monsters
description:
Mr. Marshmallow Man and the Spooky Ghost Monsters is a game about a little fella stuck in the midst of a cloud of darkness and a buncha monsters who want him dead! Dodge, weave, and scream your way through this intense bullet hell, made in 9 days for the 2022 Bullet Hell Jam! 

_____________________________________

RECOMMENDED SETTINGS

- Pixel Perfect: ON (Default)

- Sound: 3 (Default)

- Music: 3 (Default)

- and, for the love of all that is holy, please, please play the game in full screen

__________________

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow Keys to move

Shift / Space to dash

Left Click / C to shoot (C recommended for trackpad users)

_____________________________________

UPGRADES (Spoilers Ahead)

- Bullet Size -  - Increases the player's bullet size

- Shoot On Dash -  - Makes the player shoot a bullet when dashing

- Firerate Upgrade -  - Increases the player's firerate

- Lamp -  - Makes the darkness follow the player much closer, allowing the player more space to work with

- Nova -  - Makes the player shoot four diagonal bullets when getting hit

- Shadow Clone Juju -  - Gives the player a SECOND GUN
